Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mutilation \Mu`ti*la"tion\, n. [L. mutilatio: cf. F. mutilation.] The act of mutilating, or the state of being mutilated; deprivation of a limb or of an essential part. [1913 Webster]
mutilation n : an injury that deprives you of a limb or other important body part
